name: matrilineally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to or is based on family relationships on your mother's side of the family: He was young and matrilineally Jewish. Property in land and livestock was inherited matrilineally.
More examplesFewer examplesThey live in small villages, each composed of a number of matrilineally related men and their wives and children.Because tribal affiliation is passed down matrilineally, a child has a place in the tribe only if its mother is also a member of the tribe.
